channel.title: Lasso on Øystein Sørensen
channel.description: Recent content in Lasso on Øystein Sørensen

item.title: Covariate Selection in High-Dimensional Generalized Linear Models With Measurement Error
item.description: This paper proposes an extension of the generalized Dantzig selector for cases with measurement error in the predictor variables.

item.title: hdme: High-Dimensional Regression with Measurement Error
item.description: This R package contains functions for fitting variable selection models in the presence of noise in the predictor variables. In particular, it supports a corrected lasso and the generalized matrix uncertainty selector. In addition, it offers an implementation of the (generalized) Dantzig selector.

item.title: Measurement Error in Lasso: Impact and Likelihood Bias Correction
item.description: This paper analyzes the impact of covariate measurement error in the lasso method for penalized regression, and then proposes correction methods both for linear models and generalized linear models.
